title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.14.2 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cc7w 于 2020-2-2 10:59 编辑 

Minecraft基岩版是指包括Minecraft手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS、PS4）在内，使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft统一版本。正式版是Minecraft基岩版[/cohlor]经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addon和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商店也会推送此次更新。https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360038848252-Minecraft-1-14-20-Bedrock-
The team has been hard at work fixing several issues to improve gameplay! This update is not yet available on Nintendo Switch but will arrive soon. All versions of 1.14 are compatible together through multiplayer.开发团队正在努力修复问题来提升您的游戏体验！本次更新目前还未登陆任天堂Switch平台，但请坐和放宽。目前1.14的所有版本都兼容联机游玩。
Fixes:修复：Crashes / Performance崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩过程中几个可能导致游戏崩溃的BugFixed several crashes that could occur when loading into world on Nintendo Switch修复在任天堂Switch上加载世界时可能产生崩溃的BugPlacing a compass and locator map in the crafting grid no longer causes the game to crash (MCPE-57882)在合成栏中放入指南针和带有玩家标记的地图不会导致游戏崩溃了Fixed a crash that could occur when travelling through a Nether Portal with another entity (MCPE-58568)修复和其他实体一起进入下界传送门时，游戏可能崩溃的BugFixed a crash that could occur when converting a world with fireworks equipped in a crossbow修复在转换世界时，若弩中装有烟花可能导致崩溃的BugFixed a crash that could occur with raids on converted worlds修复在转换后的世界劫掠的过程中游戏可能崩溃的BugFixed a crash that could occur when loading the 'Extreme Speed Runner' Marketplace world on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One修复在PlayStation4和Xbox One上加载'Extreme Speed Runner'市场内容时，游戏可能崩溃的Bug

General常规
Classic skin choices no longer revert after reloading the game (MCPE-55278)修复重载游戏后，经典皮肤选项不恢复的BugFixed .mcworld and .mctemplate files not importing on devices running iOS 13修复iOS13设备上无法导入.mcworld和.mctemplate文件的BugFixed the LittleBigPlanet world and textures not being usable if the game was installed from disc修复在硬盘上安装游戏时，LittleBigPlanet 世界和材质无法使用的BugFixed issues with the 'Chroma Hills' texture pack not loading on Nintendo Switch修复任天堂Switch上无法加载 'Chroma Hills' 材质包的BugSplit-screen players can no longer be left in a limbo state when joining the game while the primary player quits at the same time当加入世界的同时又有一名玩家退出，分屏游玩的玩家不会退出卡在屏幕边缘了*

Gameplay游戏内容
Projectiles can now be shot through the gap between two honey blocks投射物现在可以从两个蜂蜜块中间穿过了Players no longer bounce when being pushed and pulled by honey blocks and pistons (MCPE-53815)修复被蜂蜜块和活塞推/拉时，玩家不正常弹起的Bug

Mobs怪物
Fixed an issue that prevented mobs from spawning under transparent blocks (MCPE-59682)修复阻止怪物在透明方块下生成的问题
Please note, that this fix will revert the changes made in MCPE-54241, which will require further work and will be fixed in a future update请注意，本次修改会回档MCPE-54241做出的修改，MCPE-54241会在未来的版本中重新修复
Bees no longer fly in and out of a beehive or nest that is on fire (MCPE-53872)蜜蜂不会飞进或飞出着火的蜂巢或蜂箱了Fixed tamed wolves not breeding by increasing their breeding priority (MCPE-59570)通过提升繁殖优先级修复了驯服的狼不繁育的BugTamed parrots sitting on the player's shoulder are now transitioned after world conversion玩家肩上的鹦鹉可以正常通过世界转换了Fixed Pillagers not attacking players after world conversion修复掠夺者在世界转换后不攻击玩家的bugFixed players not obtaining Bad Omen when killing a Pillager Captain after world conversion修复世界转换的存档中，击杀掠夺者队长不获得不祥之兆效果的Bug

Items物品
Tridents no longer bounce continuously on the sides of honey blocks (MCPE-53626)三叉戟不会在蜂蜜块的一侧来回弹跳了Honey Bottles now show the proper item tooltip (MCPE-61195)蜂蜜瓶现在显示正确的物品提示了Undyed Shulker Boxes now retain their color after world conversion (MCPE-36744)未染色的潜影盒会在世界转换后恢复颜色了

User Interface用户界面
A confirmation prompt now appears if purchasing Realms on Nintendo Switch在任天堂Switch上购买领域内容时，会显示确认提示了Fixed an issue that could cause text to overlap when using different window resolutions in the Marketplace修复在市场上界面使用不同的屏幕分辨率可能导致文本内容重叠的问题

Commands命令
Beehives and bee nests now have proper textures when placed with the '/setblock' command蜂巢和蜂箱使用/setblock命令放置时可以正确显示材质了Defining an execute location no longer breaks the "detect" argument定义execute执行的位置不会截止detect参数了

Add-Ons附加包
Fixed an issue that could sometimes prevent Behavior Pack animations from working on Android (MCPE-56117)修复了导致行为包的动画有时无法在Android设备上显示的问题The sensing component (used for ranged attacks) now calculates the view direction like it used to, making it so mobs can see their target on the y-axis检测系统（用于远程攻击）现在会像往常一样计算所看的方向，怪物能发现y轴上的目标了Fixed an issue that was preventing players from being teleported and rotated smoothly修复导致玩家无法平滑地传送和旋转的问题Fixed the order of 'on_exit' and 'on_entry' events being reversed in animation controller state transitions修复动画控制器状态切换时on_exit和on_entry事件顺序反了的问题Local space for particles attached to entities will once again inherit the locator's bone rotation绑定到实体上的粒子效果的本地空间又可以继承定位者的旋转角度了

正版地址Google Playhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Storehttps://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/minecraft-for-windows-10/9nblggh2jhxj外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文）Jason的Twitter（英文）Matt Booty的Twitter（英文）tomcc的Twitter（英文）MattGartzke的Twitter（英文）HelenAngel的Twitter（英文）Chupacaubrey的Twitter（英文）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）
